    • listCategories

      @GetMapping public String listCategories(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to list all categories.
      Parameters:
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the categories list page

    • getCategory

      @RequestMapping(value="/{categoryId}", method=GET) public String getCategory(@PathVariable("categoryId") Long categoryId, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws org.springframework.web.servlet.NoHandlerFoundException
      Handles the GET request to view a specific category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - the ID of the category to view
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the category view page
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.servlet.NoHandlerFoundException - if the category is not found

    • addCategoryForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @GetMapping("admin/add") public String addCategoryForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to display the form for adding a new category (admin only).
      Parameters:
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the add category form

    • handleCategoryForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @PostMapping("admin/add") public String handleCategoryForm(@Valid @ModelAttribute("category") @Valid CategoryDto categoryDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the POST request to add a new category (admin only).
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - the CategoryDto object containing the category data
      result - the BindingResult object for validation errors
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      a redirect to the category view page if successful, or the add category form if there are errors

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout()

    • editCategoryForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @GetMapping("admin/edit/{categoryId}") public String editCategoryForm(@PathVariable("categoryId") Long categoryId, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to display the form for editing a category (admin only).
      Parameters:
      categoryId - the ID of the category to edit
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      the view name for the edit category form

    • handleCategoryEditForm

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @PostMapping("admin/edit") public String handleCategoryEditForm(@Valid @ModelAttribute("category") @Valid CategoryDto categoryDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the POST request to edit a category (admin only).
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - the CategoryDto object containing the updated category data
      result - the BindingResult object for validation errors
      model - the Model object to add attributes to
      Returns:
      a redirect to the category view page if successful, or the edit category form if there are errors

    • deleteCategory

      @Secured("ROLE_ADMIN") @DeleteMapping("/admin/delete/{categoryId}") public String deleteCategory(@PathVariable Long categoryId)
      Handles the DELETE request to delete a category (admin only).
      Parameters:
      categoryId - the ID of the category to delete
      Returns:
      a redirect to the categories list page
